A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 6, 2010''', at 21:58 UTC,<ref>{{cite IRC log|DBN|tz=standard|"P3:59:00 <Notch> /indev/ has been updated"}} Note the time being 3:59:00, which means Notch started typing this message at 3:58.</ref> which added map settings. It was announced at 21:59 UTC.<ref>[[wordofnotch:320353436|Level generator updated]] – The Word of Notch, January 6, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[World options]]'''
* Level type (island, floating, flat, original).
** Island: The world is a large island, sand and gravel are common. The map is surrounded by water.
** Floating: The world is made of floating islands, under which is void. Water is rare. The map is surrounded by air.
** Flat: The surface is similar to modern [[superflat]]. Trees and flowers are generated. The map is surrounded by water.
** Original: The terrain resembles that of [[late Classic]]. The map is surrounded by water.{{verify|edition=java|type=untestable}}
* Level shape (square, long, deep).
* Level size (small, normal, huge). Map sizes were:
:::
{|class="wikitable"
|+Map sizes (width × length × height)
|
!Square
!Long
!Deep
|-
!Small
|128 × 128 × 64
|256 × 64 × 64
|64 × 64 × 256
|-
!Normal
|256 × 256 × 64
|512 × 128 × 64
|128 × 128 × 256
|-
!Huge
|512 × 512 × 64
|1024 × 256 × 64
|256 × 256 × 256
|}
* The bottommost layer of the world no longer has an infinite lava sea.{{verify|Between in-106 and
in-110|edition=java|type=untestable}}

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Creative mode]]'''
* Blocks are no longer infinite in Creative mode.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* The client crashes when the player dies.<ref name="Forum">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/minecraft-java-edition/discussion/113579-map-modes?page=2|title=This isn't a bug report, but anyone else annoyed about how the client crashes when you die?|author=PTTG|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 6, 2010}}</ref>
** It is unknown when this bug was fixed.
